amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the amount authorized in the bill for fiscal year 2004 from $3 billion to $2 billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 108-80 to reconcile funding levels with the President's budget and the budget resolution. Authorizes $2 billion in fiscal year 2004, as called for by the President's budget and the budget resolution. Increases the authorization by $500 million in each subsequent year until it reaches $4 billion in fiscal year 2008. Total authorization of $15 billion over 5 years is maintained.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 288 (Roll no. 156).
